name: Lost in the Snow (itch) (swl416, vaniita)
description:
Winter was relaxing on a cruise ship, but suddenly got shipwrecked and is now stranded on a snowy island. Help her collect materials to build a ship and return back home. Be aware of the cute but deadly enemies who are defending their territory! 

Controls:

  • Move: AWSD/ arrow keys
  • Shoot: left/ right ctrl keys
  • Jump: space bar
